name: FUN_FG_VALUE
body_snippet:
FUNCTION FUN_FG_VALUE (parm_last_years_id  NUMBER,
                                         parm_start_date     DATE,
                                         parm_sub_inv        NUMBER,
                                         parm_date           DATE) RETURN NUMBER
															         
IS
		 lnum_wip_qty				NUMBER  := 0;	
BEGIN
     FOR cur_fg in (SELECT pckg_inv.get_balance_qty( parm_last_years_id,
                                                     parm_start_date,
                                                     null,
                                                     parm_sub_inv,
                                                     jcmt.fg_locator_comb_id,
                                                     so.item_id,
                                                     parm_date) loc_qty,
                           amount,
                           nvl(prod_qty.qty ,0)qty_prod,
                           nvl(wip_qty.qty,0)qty,
                           JCMT.job_card_id
                    FROM
                       ubc_job_card_mt jcmt,
                       ubc_so_mt so,
                       inv_cat_set_definition catdef,
					             items_category icat, 
					             view_code_combinations  itm_cat ,
					             temp_code_combination_criteria temp_code,
					             ITEMS_MT ITM,
                       (SELECT 
                             IDET.CC_CODE_COMB_ID CC,
                      
                             SUM(decode
